mapper.insert: insert into flink(flinkid , flinkname , url , addtime , memo ) values(#{flinkid} , #{flinkname} , #{url} , #{addtime} , #{memo} )
mapper.update: update flink set flinkname=#{flinkname} , url=#{url} , addtime=#{addtime} , memo=#{memo} where flinkid=#{flinkid}
mapper.select: select a.* from flink a order by flinkid desc
select a.* from flink a where flinkid=#{flinkid} order by flinkid desc

select a.* from flink a where 1=1
and a.flinkname like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{flinkname}, '%'))
and a.url like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{url}, '%'))
and a.addtime like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{addtime}, '%'))
and a.memo like CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{memo}, '%'))
